docs.snippet: Italian football will soon be dying if it does not overcome its deep-rooted structural problems, Juventus president Andrea Agnelli said on Friday....

headline.main: Italian Football in Danger of Dying, Says Juve President
headline.print_headline: Italian Football in Danger of Dying, Says Juve President

docs.lead_paragraph: Italian football will soon be dying if it does not overcome its deep-rooted structural problems, Juventus president Andrea Agnelli said on Friday.

docs.snippet: Oilfield services company Baker Hughes Inc. says the number of rigs exploring for oil and natural gas in the U.S. rose by nine this week to 1,927....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oilfield services company Baker Hughes Inc. says the number of rigs exploring for oil and natural gas in the U.S. rose by nine this week to 1,927.

docs.snippet: A student opens fire at Marysville-Pilchuck High School in Washington state, wounding an unknown number of victims before killing himself. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....

headline.main: Student opens fire at a Washington state high school
headline.sub: Student opens fire at a Washington state high school

docs.lead_paragraph: A student opens fire at Marysville-Pilchuck High School in Washington state, wounding an unknown number of victims before killing himself. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

docs.snippet: Staff at Bank of Ireland, the country's largest bank by assets, are set to receive their first pay increase in six years after the part state-owned lender reached an agreement with its largest trade union on Friday....

headline.main: Bank of Ireland Staff Set for First Pay Rise Since Crisis
headline.print_headline: Bank of Ireland Staff Set for First Pay Rise Since Crisis

docs.lead_paragraph: Staff at Bank of Ireland, the country's largest bank by assets, are set to receive their first pay increase in six years after the part state-owned lender reached an agreement with its largest trade union on Friday.

docs.snippet: Canada has lost to Mexico in a bid to build engines for Ford Motor Co....

headline.main: Canada Loses Bid to Make Ford Engines to Mexico
headline.print_headline: Canada Loses Bid to Make Ford Engines to Mexico

docs.lead_paragraph: Canada has lost to Mexico in a bid to build engines for Ford Motor Co.

docs.snippet: The massive private art museum dreamed up by the LVMH chairman and prolific contemporary-art collector Bernard Arnault and designed by the starchitect Frank Gehry debuts on Oct. 27....

headline.main: The Fondation Louis Vuitton Opens at Last

docs.abstract: The massive private art museum dreamed up by the LVMH chairman and prolific contemporary-art collector Bernard Arnault and designed by the starchitect Frank Gehry debuts on Oct. 27.

docs.snippet: A federal investigation has found that Army officials discriminated against a transgender employee who underwent a sex change while working at an Alabama installation....

headline.main: Review: Army Biased Against Transgender Worker
headline.print_headline: Review: Army Biased Against Transgender Worker

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal investigation has found that Army officials discriminated against a transgender employee who underwent a sex change while working at an Alabama installation.

docs.snippet: Rwanda has suspended the BBC's local radio service after the broadcaster aired a documentary that questioned official accounts of the 1994 genocide, the Rwanda Utilities Regulatory Authority said on Friday....

headline.main: Rwanda Suspends BBC's Local Radio Service Over Genocide Documentary
headline.print_headline: Rwanda Suspends BBC's Local Radio Service Over Genocide Documentary

docs.lead_paragraph: Rwanda has suspended the BBC's local radio service after the broadcaster aired a documentary that questioned official accounts of the 1994 genocide, the Rwanda Utilities Regulatory Authority said on Friday.
